page.title: 19The Domesday Poem
page.content: It was 1066 when he first made his plan, He said,"I'll record every woman and man, Every cook, every crook, in one great big book, People from everywhere will come to look." And now it is famous all over the nation, If only King William could see his creation. And now with computers again we can do it, It's very much quicker, there's not a lot to it, So now{we're}recording every woman and man. Every cook, every crook on a{computer {scan!} by{Mary Charlton}and{Veronica Oliver} aged 9 of Seaton Delaval.
